parameter map.label: GTPG
parameter map.desc: GTY power good

parameter map.label: RGTY
parameter map.desc: Function not documented

parameter map.label: RTXD
parameter map.desc: GTY Tx Reset Done

parameter map.label: RRXD
parameter map.desc: GTY Rx Reset Done

parameter map.label: RBAL
parameter map.desc: GTY byte is aligned

parameter map.label: RS
parameter map.desc: RX engine snapshot

parameter map.label: TS
parameter map.desc: TX engine snapshot

parameter map.label: TNS
parameter map.desc: Next state of TX engine. TNS0 = 8 x 4bit fields corresponding to states of engine 0..7. Similarly TNS1 engines 15..9. Etc.

parameter map.label: RNS
parameter map.desc: Next state of RX engine state machine 0:8

parameter map.label: TCS
parameter map.desc: current state to TX engine

parameter map.label: PDPL
parameter map.desc: power down pll

parameter map.label: RCS
parameter map.desc: current state to RX engine

parameter map.label: RBWD
parameter map.desc: RX engine received 'bad' i.e.non-0x959595BC word

parameter map.label: SRST
parameter map.desc: software resetn     -- TODO this probably needs moving out of FEMstr regs to a global reg.bank

parameter map.label: RVSR
parameter map.desc: used as control input to direction controller

parameter map.label: TDIR
parameter map.desc: used to select direction (cw or ccw) on which slwo control goes out

parameter map.label: RDIR
parameter map.desc: used to select rx engine (cw or ccw) on which slow control are received

parameter map.label: TYM
parameter map.desc: 64-bit time to be loaded upon a strobe (see also LDST)

parameter map.label: LDST
parameter map.desc: bit 0 = artificial strobe, causes local time registers to begin counting; bit 1 = load signal, tells local time regs to stop counting and re-latch TYME and wait for a strobe

parameter map.label: MS
parameter map.desc: snapshots of the local time according to tx engines

parameter map.label: TM
parameter map.desc: time when a 'set time' slow-control was sent to ring (used in t-o-f measurements)

parameter map.label: RM
parameter map.desc: time the most recent slow-control reply was received (used in t-o-f measurements)

parameter map.label: TMOF
parameter map.desc: time-of-flight offset that gets added to current time when sending tiome to slaves

parameter map.label: TPLS
parameter map.desc: time at which to emit a pulse (e.g. for viewing pulse per sec on 'scope)

parameter map.label: TDUR
parameter map.desc: duration of TPLS

parameter map.label: MN
parameter map.desc: bits 0:4 encode minimum node on ring; bits 8:12 encode maximum node

parameter map.label: PLEN
parameter map.desc: length of bulk data packets launched around the ring

parameter map.label: RSRX
parameter map.desc: gtwiz_reset_rx_pll_and_datapath_in port of gty reset module
